page.title: 14Aberford Shopping Facilities
page.content: Here is some information about Aberford's shops. {Spar Foodshop-}Temporarily closed. {Wards-}prop.Mr.K.Ward.Butchers,green- grocers,crisps and ices.Opens 9.45am to 5.00pm.except Wednesdays when 9.45 am.to 1.00pm. and Mondays 9.45am.-1pm {Bennetts-}general hardware and cycle shop.Prop.Mr.A.Bennett.Opens9.ooam- 5.30pm.Half day Monday. {Addy's Stores-}food,sweets,offlicence. Props.Mr.and Mrs.Farrar.Opens 8.15 am to 5.30 pm. and 7.30-9.30pm.Half day Mondays. {Post Office-}Prop.Mrs.A.Lloyd.Sell stamps etc.wool,cards,sweets.Open 9am to noon and 1.30pm.to5.30pm.except Monday and Saturday afternoons. {Fish and Chip Shop-}Prop.Mr.B.Fox.Open daily except for Mondays and Tuesdays. {Greenhill Stores}Sells food,fruit and veg.and sweets.Prop.Mrs.Law.
